info.title: Sitecore XM Cloud Deploy API
info.description: Web API for managing organizations, projects, environments and deployments in the XM Cloud Deploy system

post.summary: Upload source code to a deployment (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage)

400.description: Problem validating the source code upload.

409.description: A deployment is already running for this deployment.

post.summary: Upload source code to a deployment (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage)

400.description: Problem validating the source code upload.

409.description: A deployment is already running for this deployment.

delete.summary: Deletes an environment variable by target (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The target name. If target is empty, deletes the environment variable for all targets

404.description: Invalid environment ID or environment variable name.

get.summary: Get list of all environments (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

parameters.name: Types
parameters.description: Filter environments based on the type, value can be cm, or eh.

parameters.name: ProjectIds
parameters.description: Filter environments based on the project ids

get.summary: Retrieves all deployments for a given environment. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

post.summary: Deploy to an environment. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

parameters.name: redeploy
parameters.description: When redeploy is true, deploys with the existing source, whether that is from a commit on a linked repository or has been uploaded previously.

location.description: Location of the newly created Deployment.

schema.description: Location of the newly created Deployment.

409.description: Conflict creating deployment.  Deployment already running for this environment.

post.summary: Creates a new deployment for an environment from an existing deployment. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: The environment ID of the target environment.

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: The deployment ID of the source deployment.

location.description: Location of the newly created Deployment.

schema.description: Location of the newly created Deployment.

404.description: Invalid environment ID or invalid deployment ID.

409.description: Conflict during promotion.  Attempted to promote a deployment that is in a failure state.

get.summary: Retrieves an environment by ID. (Auth policies: ValidateEnvironment)
Returns the organization by ID (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)
Retrieves the health of the organization by ID (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

503.description: Service endpoint is currently unavaible.  Please retry later.

get.summary: Validates that a project name is unique. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the project to validate for uniqueness.

get.summary: Gets a project by project ID. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

200.description: Returns the project found by the project ID.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of Projects. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)
Gets a list of environments in the project by project ID. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

200.description: Returned a list of environment successfully.

post.summary: Create environment for the project. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

location.description: Location of the newly created Environment.

schema.description: Location of the newly created Environment.

402.description: Exceeded the number of environments allowed for the project according to the limitations of the organization subscription.

503.description: Environment configuration store or inventory is unavailable.  Environment creation is temporarily disabled.  Please retry.

get.summary: Validates that a source control integration is valid. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

200.description: Retrieved the source control validation result successfully.

get.summary: Get all source control integrations with project references (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

200.description: Retrieved the list of integration successfully.

put.summary: Subscibe to the git events for the given provider (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

get.summary: Validates that a repository is valid. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

environmentType.description: Type of environment, it can be eh or cm.

repositoryBranch.description: Repository branch if linked to source control and branch

tenantType.description: Type of the tenant - Prod or Non-Prod

provisioningLastFailureMessage.description: Last failure message of the deployment

deployOnCommit.description: True when environment is set to deploy automatically when commits are made to source control

createdAt.description: Date when the environment was created

lastUpdatedBy.description: user who last updated the environment

lastUpdatedAt.description: Date when the environment was last updated

isDeleted.description: True when the environment has been soft-deleted

highAvailabilityEnabled.description: Gets or sets a flag indicating if the environment's deployments should support high availability.

data.description: List of items of type T
List of items of type T

repository.description: The source control repository of the project if linked

repositoryId.description: The source control repository ID of the project if linked

sourceControlIntegrationId.description: The source control integration ID of the project if linked

sourceControlIntegrationName.description: The source control integration name of the project if linked

repositoryLinkedAt.description: The Date that project linked to a source control repository

createdAt.description: The date when the project was created

createdBy.description: The user that created the project

lastUpdatedBy.description: The user who last updated the project

lastUpdatedAt.description: The date when the project was last updated

isLocked.description: Indicates whether the project is locked

lockedAt.description: Indicates when the project was locked.

isValid.description: True when the project name is valid

message.description: Message for the project name validation

Bearer.description: Authorization header using the Bearer scheme (Example: 'Bearer your_jwt')
Bearer.name: Authorization
